message: Hello Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to your portfolio, and I'm pleased to offer it to you for $1,450,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to pay up to $1,300,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but the value of this product is truly undeniable. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,375,000.  I believe this is a fair compromise.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my budget, I am able to consider $1,325,000 as a reasonable price for the product.
